ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate Items
ygData.msgSnippet: Friend of mine got a mace called Evensong last night. 11/25 wgt 3. Same as the six note blade. Good Journey, Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule) 8)-----Original
ygData.messageBody:
Friend of mine got a mace called 'Evensong' last night. 11/25 wgt 3. Same
as the six note blade.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
8)[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
8)Sent: Saturday, November 13, 1999 10:06 AM
8)To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
8)Subject: [eqbards] Plane of Hate Items
8)
8)
8)From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
8)
8)i was wondering if anyone has heard of our imbrued platemail
8)armor being
8)dropped in the Plane of Hate yet. supposedly it was moved
8)there from the
8)Plane of Fear, along with warrior, shaman, paladin, rogue,
8)magician, and
8)enchanter items. Boogeymen in PoF definitely drop
8)necromancer armor now,
8)but so far no imbrued has been found in PoH on my server.
8)not that PoH is
8)not good for bards, in fact they definitely thought of us here (for a
8)change). so far i have gotten these bard only items in PoH...
8)
8)Six Note Blade: 1h slashing, dmg11 del25 wt3, found on the Maestro of
8)Rancor, looks like a ykesha.
8)
8)Kelin's Seven Stringed Lute: +9dex, +15cha, +9agi, also found
8)on the Maestro
8)of Rancor, still very forgetful to test its effects, though i
8)think at 25hp
8)per pulse sitting with hymn, there is an improvement.
8)
8)Martune Rapier: Piercing, dmg8 del23 +5str +4agi off a scorn
8)banshee (i
8)assumed these banshees would have imbrued, though they have
8)only had rapiers
8)so far).
8)
8)Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
8)Tyria Sarkin, L29 High Elf Wizard
8)Manda D'ulin, L21 Wood Elf Warrior
8)Mithaniel Marr Server
8)
